messages.subject: Re: You're all invited.....
messages.msgSnippet: ... her own enjoyment and for the pleasure of helping others. ... seats, but unfortunately we live in Florida. ... I m still pinching myself. She s very
messages.messageBody:
>
> I think that is wonderful that Meera wants to do this! Purely for
her own enjoyment and for the pleasure of helping others.
> What more could we hope for from our children?
>
> Well done!
>
> I wish that I could be there with my brood.....we would fill up 7
seats, but unfortunately we live in Florida.
>
> Please keep us informed as to how this all turns out.
>
> Peace~
>
> Jennifer

I'm still pinching myself. She's very excited that a hairdresser has
stepped forward to do her hair for her (and is already thinking about
where she is going for her post-recital dinner!) I'm just sitting back
and trying (hard) to keep my mouth shut -- don't want to ruin it.

messages.subject: Re: You're all invited.....
messages.msgSnippet: United Churches, in Olympia, Washington, September 20th, 7:30 p.m. Kids EXTREMELY welcome. Consider yourselves threatened.... david www.skylarksings.com David~
messages.messageBody:
United Churches, in Olympia, Washington, September 20th, 7:30 p.m.
Kids EXTREMELY welcome.

Consider yourselves threatened....

david
www.skylarksings.com


David~

I think that is wonderful that Meera wants to do this! Purely for her own enjoyment and for the pleasure of helping others.
What more could we hope for from our children?

Well done!

I wish that I could be there with my brood.....we would fill up 7 seats, but unfortunately we live in Florida.

Please keep us informed as to how this all turns out.

Peace~

Jennifer

I'll carry your books, I'll carry a tune,
I'll carry on, carry over, carry forward,
Cary Grant, cash & carry, Carry Me Back To Old Virginia,
I'll even Hara Kari if you show me how,
but I will *not* carry a gun.
- Hawkeye, M*A*S*H
